physical_appearance:The image shows a black-and-white photograph. It is rectangular and it features a man. He is bare-chested and wearing shorts. He is sitting on a bed
 with a book in one hand and a cigarette in the other. At the lefthand side of the photograph is a notice board with several notes and cut-outs pasted on it. There is a also a stand underneath the notice board
 where there are some items on it.
